messages.content: कही रोग आहे का बागेवर
messages.en: Is there a disease in the garden?
messages.standalone_question: Is there any disease in the garden?
messages.standalone_en: Is there any disease in the garden?

messages.content: तुमच्या बागेवर सध्या कोणतेही रोग नाहीत. तुम्ही काळजी न करता तुमच्या पिकांची देखभाल करू शकता.
messages.en: There are currently no diseases in your garden. You can take care of your crops without worrying.

messages.content: कही कमतारता आहे का बागेवर
messages.en: Is there something lacking in the garden?
messages.standalone_question: Is there any deficiency in the garden?
messages.standalone_en: Is there any deficiency in the garden?

messages.content: तुमच्या बागेवर सध्या कोणतीही कमतरता नाही. तुम्ही तुमच्या पिकांची काळजी घेऊ शकता.
messages.en: There's no shortage on your garden right now. You can take care of your crops.

messages.content: पाऊस पडेल का
messages.en: Will it rain?

messages.content:
पुढील काही दिवसांमध्ये पाऊस पडण्याची शक्यता आहे. 

- **16 मे**: 2.0 मिमी पाऊस, 30% शक्यता
- **17 मे**: 4.8 मिमी पाऊस, 25% शक्यता
- **18 मे**: 6.0 मिमी पाऊस, 15% शक्यता
- **19 मे**: 15.4 मिमी पाऊस, 5% शक्यता

तुम्ही पाण्याची गरज असल्यास, पाऊस थांबल्यानंतर एक दिवसाने मातीची ओलसरता तपासा.
messages.en:
Rain is expected in the next few days. 

- **16 May**: 2.0 mm rainfall, 30% chance
- **17 May**: 4.8 mm rainfall, 25% chance
- **18 May**: 6.0 mm rainfall, 15% chance
- **19 May**: 15.4 mm rainfall, 5% chance

If you need water, check soil moisture a day after the rain stops.

messages.content: स्प्रे काय घ्यावा
messages.en: What to take the spray
messages.standalone_question: What type of spray should I use?
messages.standalone_en: What type of spray should I use?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content: तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी या आठवड्यात कोणत्याही रोग किंवा कीटकांसाठी स्प्रेची शिफारस नाही. तुम्ही सध्या स्प्रे घेण्याची गरज नाही.
messages.en: Spray is not recommended for any diseases or pests this week for your plot. You don't need to take a spray right now.

messages.content: पावसाळ्यात गर्भ धारणा होण्यासाठी काय उपाययोजना करावी
messages.en: What measures should be taken to get pregnant during monsoon
messages.standalone_question: What measures should be taken to conceive during the rainy season?
messages.standalone_en: What measures should be taken to conceive during the rainy season?
messages.content_transliterated: pavasalyat garbh dharna honyasathi kay upayayojana karavi

messages.content:
पावसाळ्यात गर्भधारणेसाठी खालील उपाययोजना कराव्यात:

1. **सिंचन व्यवस्थापन**: योग्य पाण्याचा वापर करून मातीची आर्द्रता नियंत्रित करा. पाण्याची ओलसरता 0-5 kPa असावी.

2. **मातीची आरोग्य तपासणी**: मातीची गुणवत्ता आणि पोषणतत्त्वे तपासा. आवश्यक असल्यास, योग्य खतांचा वापर करा.

3. **कीटक नियंत्रण**: पावसाळ्यात कीटकांची वाढ होऊ शकते, त्यामुळे कीटकनाशकांचा वापर करा.

4. **पिकांची निवड**: पावसाळ्यात चांगली गर्भधारणा होणारी पिके निवडा.

5. **सिंचन प्रणाली**: ड्रिप सिंचन किंवा स्प्रिंकलर प्रणालीचा वापर करून पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन करा.

6. **पिकांची काळजी**: पिकांच्या वाढीच्या अवस्थेनुसार योग्य काळजी घ्या, जसे की छाटणी आणि खतांचा वापर.

या उपाययोजनांनी गर्भधारणेसाठी अनुकूल वातावरण तयार होईल.
messages.en:
The following measures should be taken for pregnancy during the rainy season:

1. **Irrigation Management**: Control soil moisture using proper water. The moisture content of the water should be 0-5 kPa.

2. **Soil health check**: Check soil quality and nutrients. If necessary, use the right fertilizers.

3. **Pest control**: Insects can grow during the rainy season, so use pesticides.

4. **Crop selection**: Choose crops that have a good pregnancy during the rainy season.

5. **Irrigation System**: Manage water using drip irrigation or sprinkler system.

6. **Crop care**: Take proper care according to the growth stage of the crops, such as pruning and fertilizer use.

These measures will create a conducive environment for pregnancy.

messages.content: द्राक्ष साठी गर्भधारणा साठी काय करावे
messages.en: What to do to conceive for grapes
messages.standalone_question: What measures should be taken for grape cultivation to ensure successful fertilization?
messages.standalone_en: What measures should be taken for grape cultivation to ensure successful fertilization?

faq:
Q: How to improve the germination percent
A: Use of good quality seeds and seeds to be treated with insecticide, Fungicide and biological agents

messages.content_transliterated: draks sathi garbhadharana sathi kay karave

messages.content:
द्राक्षांच्या गर्भधारणेसाठी खालील उपाययोजना करा:

1. **सिंचन व्यवस्थापन**: मातीची आर्द्रता योग्य ठेवण्यासाठी नियमितपणे पाणी द्या. द्राक्षांना 0-5 kPa ओलसरता आवश्यक आहे.

2. **खतांचा वापर**: द्राक्षांच्या गर्भधारणेसाठी आवश्यक पोषणतत्त्वे सुनिश्चित करण्यासाठी संतुलित खतांचा वापर करा. विशेषतः नायट्रोजन, फॉस्फरस आणि पोटॅशियम यांचे प्रमाण योग्य ठेवा.

3. **कीटक नियंत्रण**: द्राक्षांवर येणाऱ्या कीटकांपासून संरक्षण करण्यासाठी कीटकनाशकांचा वापर करा. 

4. **पिकांची काळजी**: योग्य छाटणी आणि पिकांच्या वाढीच्या अवस्थेनुसार काळजी घ्या. 

5. **सूर्यप्रकाश**: द्राक्षांना योग्य प्रमाणात सूर्यप्रकाश मिळावा याची काळजी घ्या, कारण यामुळे गर्भधारणा सुधारते.

6. **पाण्याची गुणवत्ता**: पाण्याची गुणवत्ता चांगली असावी, त्यामुळे कोणत्याही प्रकारच्या प्रदूषणापासून द्राक्षांचे संरक्षण होईल.

या उपाययोजनांनी द्राक्षांच्या गर्भधारणेसाठी अनुकूल वातावरण तयार होईल.
messages.en:
Take the following measures for grape pregnancy:

1. **Irrigation Management**: Water regularly to keep soil moisture right. Grapes require 0-5 kPa moisture.

2. **Fertilizer use**: Use balanced fertilizers to ensure the nutrients needed for grape pregnancy. In particular, keep the amount of nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium right.

3. **Pest Control**: Use pesticides to protect grapes from pests. 

4. **Crop care**: Take care according to proper pruning and crop growth stage. 

5. **Sunlight**: Make sure the grapes get the right amount of sunlight, as it improves pregnancy.

6. **Water quality**: Water quality should be good, so that grapes will be protected from any kind of pollution.

These measures will create a conducive environment for grapes to conceive.

messages.content: 120 ppm in gm
messages.en: 120 ppm in gm

messages.content:
To convert 120 ppm (parts per million) to grams, you need to know the volume of the solution you're referring to. 

1 ppm is equivalent to 1 mg of solute per liter of solution. Therefore, 120 ppm means 120 mg of solute per liter.

If you have a specific volume in liters, you can calculate the grams as follows:

\[
\text{Grams} = \text{ppm} \times \text{Volume in liters} \div 1000
\]

Please provide the volume of the solution in liters for a precise conversion.
messages.en:
To convert 120 ppm (parts per million) to grams, you need to know the volume of the solution you're referring to. 

1 ppm is equivalent to 1 mg of solute per liter of solution. Therefore, 120 ppm means 120 mg of solute per liter.

If you have a specific volume in liters, you can calculate the grams as follows:

\[
\text{Grams} = \text{ppm} \times \text{Volume in liters} \div 1000
\]

Please provide the volume of the solution in liters for a precise conversion.

tools:
analyse_crop_image  
Gets the analysis of the uploaded crop image for any diseases or pests.

messages.content:
The analysis of the soil report for your grape cultivation in **purple plot 2** has provided the following findings:

### Soil Report Findings:
1. **Total Nitrogen (N)**: 1.39% (Optimal: 0.91 - 1.61)
2. **Nitrate Nitrogen (NO3-N)**: 1083 ppm (Optimal: 700 - 1200)
3. **Ammonical Nitrogen (NH4-N)**: 1519 ppm (High: 400 - 700)
4. **Phosphorus (P)**: 0.29% (Optimal: 0.21 - 0.51)
5. **Potassium (K)**: 1.97% (Optimal: 1.21 - 2.51)
6. **Calcium (Ca)**: 0.90% (Low: 1.51 - 2.51)
7. **Magnesium (Mg)**: 0.41% (Optimal: 0.31 - 0.61)
8. **Sulphur (S)**: 0.10% (Low: 0.15 - 0.51)
9. **Ferrous (Fe)**: 58 ppm (Low: 80 - 120)
10. **Manganese (Mn)**: 56 ppm (Optimal: 25 - 100)
11. **Zinc (Zn)**: 41 ppm (Optimal: 20 - 50)
12. **Copper (Cu)**: 14 ppm (Optimal: 5 - 15)
13. **Boron (B)**: 40 ppm (High: 15 - 30)
14. **Molybdenum (Mo)**: 1.65 ppm (High: 0.25 - 1.51)
15. **Sodium (Na)**: 0.07% (Optimal: 0.01 - 0.51)
16. **Chloride (Cl)**: 0.10% (Optimal: 0.05 - 0.25)

### Summary:
- Nitrogen levels are optimal, but ammonical nitrogen is high, which may lead to nutrient imbalances.
- Phosphorus and potassium levels are within optimal ranges.
- Calcium and sulphur levels are low, which could affect plant health.
- Micronutrients show a mix of optimal and low levels, with iron, boron, and molybdenum being areas of concern.

### Recommendations:
- Consider adding calcium and sulphur to improve nutrient balance.
- Monitor the high levels of ammonical nitrogen and boron to prevent potential toxicity.
- Regularly check micronutrient levels to ensure they remain within optimal ranges.

This analysis indicates that while your grape crop has a good foundation, attention should be given to specific nutrient deficiencies and excesses for optimal growth. If you need further assistance or specific recommendations, feel free to ask!

This analysis indicates that while your grape crop has a good foundation, attention should be given to specific nutrient deficiencies and excesses for optimal growth. If you need further assistance or specific recommendations, feel free to ask!

messages.content: In 40 ppm what is in kg
messages.en: In 40 ppm what is in kg
messages.standalone_question: What is the equivalent of 40 ppm in kilograms?
messages.standalone_en: What is the equivalent of 40 ppm in kilograms?

messages.content:
To convert parts per million (ppm) to kilograms, you can use the following formula:

\[
\text{kg} = \frac{\text{ppm} \times \text{volume of solution in liters}}{1,000,000}
\]

If you have a specific volume of solution in liters, please provide that, and I can calculate the equivalent in kilograms for you. If you want to assume a certain volume, please specify that as well.
messages.en:
To convert parts per million (ppm) to kilograms, you can use the following formula:

\[
\text{kg} = \frac{\text{ppm} \times \text{volume of solution in liters}}{1,000,000}
\]

If you have a specific volume of solution in liters, please provide that, and I can calculate the equivalent in kilograms for you. If you want to assume a certain volume, please specify that as well.

messages.content: 58 ppm in kg
messages.en: 58 ppm in kg
messages.standalone_question: What is the equivalent of 58 ppm in kilograms?
messages.standalone_en: What is the equivalent of 58 ppm in kilograms?

messages.content:
To convert 58 ppm to kilograms, we need to know the volume of the solution in liters. Assuming you want to calculate it for 1 liter of solution, the conversion would be:

\[
\text{kg} = \frac{58 \, \text{ppm} \times 1 \, \text{liter}}{1,000,000} = 0.000058 \, \text{kg} = 0.058 \, \text{grams}
\]

So, 58 ppm is equivalent to **0.058 grams** in 1 liter of solution. If you have a different volume in mind, please let me know!
messages.en:
To convert 58 ppm to kilograms, we need to know the volume of the solution in liters. Assuming you want to calculate it for 1 liter of solution, the conversion would be:

\[
\text{kg} = \frac{58 \, \text{ppm} \times 1 \, \text{liter}}{1,000,000} = 0.000058 \, \text{kg} = 0.058 \, \text{grams}
\]

So, 58 ppm is equivalent to **0.058 grams** in 1 liter of solution. If you have a different volume in mind, please let me know!
